Which of the following is the correct syntax to create a cookie using JavaScript?
questions.A: browser.cookie = 'key1 = value1; key2 = value2; expires = date';
questions.B: document.cookie = 'key1 = value1; key2 = value2; expires = date';
questions.C: window.cookie = 'key1 = value1; key2 = value2; expires = date';
questions.D: navigator.cookie = 'key1 = value1; key2 = value2; expires = date';
questions.answer: document.cookie = 'key1 = value1; key2 = value2; expires = date';
